Gwion

A strongly timed musical programming language

Gwion features unamed union.
declared object are refs

at global scope:

union { int i; float f; complex c; Object o; };

same at class scope:

class C { union { int i; float f; complex c; Object o; }; }

Gwion is maintained by Jérémie Astor. This page was generated by GitHub Pages, with a theme based on Cayman theme by Jason Long.
